title: Tout le monde en parle
resume: Guy A. Lepage hosts the people that everyone is talking about! Recorded in front of a live audience, this weekly talk show brings together six to eight personalities from different milieus—sports, politics, stage productions and more. What do they have in common? They are the subject of everyone’s conversations and/or are important figures in recent events. Participants are invited to speak freely, voicing their opinions on headline news or on a subject that is near and dear to them.
